creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: one-paneled triple striped red and white cotton shawl with endings in the colors dark and light blue, dark and light pink, light yellow, orange and lime green; 2 fine braided cords attached, ending in 2 long tassels; hand embroidered flowers at the basis of each cord
title: Woman's Shawl
